entry.title: Mona Lisa - Marbled Chocolate Pencils Extra Large - 110 Pcs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mona Lisa
Type: BAKING
Price: 31.99

 

Chocolate Pencils – Marbled – 200 mm
Marbled chocolate thins, rolled up into luxury delights

Finish in style with these 200 mm rolls of marvelously marbled chocolate

Marbled looks, marvelous mixed chocolate taste.
You're on a roll with Van Gogh Marbled Chocolate Pencils. Made with Belgian dark and white chocolate, they have a nice satin gloss and a lovely colour, gradually shifting from dark to white. Their subtle snap and chocolate taste that dances on the palate from intense cocoa to creamy milk make them perfect for snacking and for decorating your cakes and desserts. Their delicately crafted, artisan look and generous length, enable you to instantly create an eye-catching and elegant chocolate finishing touch. 

Snappy creamy and marbled chocolate that melts on the tongue.

BULK MART CANNOT guarantee the prevention of melting chocolate products, no matter the month or current temperature, even though you may follow our recommendation and CHOOSE the fastest shipping method melting still may occur. Purchase at your own risk.

entry.title: Callebaut - Small Shaped Cups Dark Chocolate - 312 / Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Callebaut
Type: BAKING
Price: 64.99

Callebaut CHD-CP-05767-999 - Petit Fours Chocolate Cups - 312 / Case

Kosher Dairy

Small Shaped Cups – Dark
Mix and match with great chocolate taste

Ready for your creativity

100% dark chocolate.
Small Shaped Cups are made of 100% Callebaut® dark chocolate. This mix of 4 differently shaped low-cut cups looks amazing on any dessert display. Their wide shape enables easy filling and decorating. In no time, you can transform them into small pastries, desserts or petits fours.
Fill them to the taste with chocolate ganache, ice cream, crème, caramel, mousses, fruits, etc. Small Shaped Cups are also a great idea for café gourmand or dessert buffet presentations. Explore our chocolate decorations section for ideas on how to give them a beautiful finishing touch. 

45 mm w (top) x 15 mm H x 35 mm W (bottom) / 50 mm W (top) x 15 mm H x 40 mm W (bottom)

entry.summary:
Vendor: Callebaut
Type: BAKING
Price: 17.99

Callebaut - Crispearls Mini Chocolate - 425 g

CEM-CC-MIMIXE0-999

KD - Kosher - Dairy  63.5%CHOCOLATE

A mix of truly tiny chocolate pearls with a crispy heart.
Here's comes a playful mix of miniature pearls in dark, milk and white chocolate coated around a tiny toasted biscuit. They're great for snacking – resist you can – and for the decoration of drinks, desserts, cakes and pastries.


Mini Chocolate Crispearls™ come in a handy sprinkler for you to top off your glazed cakes, pastries, cream-topped drinks or desserts with one twist. Mixed into chocolate mousse, ice cream or bavarois, they add a crispy chocolate texture to your desserts and remain deliciously crunchy.

A mix of miniature dark, milk and white chocolate pearls with a heart of crunchy, toasted biscuit.

entry.title: Callebaut - Truffle Shells Dark Chocolate - 504 Pcs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Callebaut
Type: BAKING
Price: 59.99

Callebaut - Truffle Shells Dark - 504 Pcs  / 1.36 Kg

CHD-TS-17137-999

Truffle Shells – Dark
Fill them. Dip them. Texturise them. Go!

The truffle shell ready for your filling ideas

The snappy dark chocolate shells for your truffles.
Truffle Shells Dark are just great for creating your perfect truffles. The shells - made of 100% dark chocolate – have a lovely snap and intense taste to delight your customers.
They have an accommodating opening so you can easily fill them with any fluid ganache, praline or cream filling. To give them the finishing touch you're after, just dip them in tempered chocolate and then roll them in cocoa powder, Chocolate Shavings, Chocolate Blossoms, Crispearls™, Chocolate Flakes or Vermicelli. Anything goes.
Truffle Shells invite you to let your creativity run wild, and play with looks, textures and colours.

Lovely snap and intense dark taste of Belgian dark chocolate
